welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gisborne, Australia! Get ready to experience the charm of our coastal city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture and delicious food. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and discovering all that Gisborne has to offer."

terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Melbourne - Tullamarine Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
